class_description: Use this class when performing asynchronous operations with a file coordinator using the coordinator’s coordinate(with:queue:byAccessor:) method.

params.param_description: The URL of the document you intend to read from.
The coordinated reading options. For a list of valid values, see NSFileCoordinator.ReadingOptions in the NSFileCoordinator.

return_description: A newly instantiated and configured file access intent object.

Methods.method_description: Returns a file access intent object for reading the given URL with the provided options.
Methods.method_declar: class func readingIntent(with url: URL, options: NSFileCoordinator.ReadingOptions = []) -> Self

params.param_description: The URL of the document you intend to write to.
The coordinated writing options. For a list of valid values, see NSFileCoordinator.WritingOptions in the NSFileCoordinator.

return_description: A newly instantiated and configured file access intent object.

Methods.method_description: Returns a file access intent object for writing to the given URL with the provided options.
Methods.method_declar: class func writingIntent(with url: URL, options: NSFileCoordinator.WritingOptions = []) -> Self

Vars.var_description: The current URL for the item managed by the file access intent instance. (read-only)
